product_name: Amphipod RunLite AirStretch 4 Hydration Belt - 32 fl. oz.
long_description: The Amphipod RunLite AirStretchTM 4 hydration belt offers breathable comfort in a hip-gripping design. Chafe-free edging and rip-and-stick front closure make it a breeze to wear while on the run.
short_description: The Amphipod RunLite AirStretchTM 4 hydration belt offers breathable comfort in a hip-gripping design. Chafe-free edging and rip-and-stick front closure make it a breeze to wear while on the run.
